sentence: He absorbed the knowledge or beliefs of his tribe .
He absorbed the costs for the accident .
The sales tax is absorbed into the state income tax .
The immigrants were quickly absorbed into society .
Her interest in butterflies absorbs her completely .
This boss abuses his workers .
Do n't abuse the system .
The actress abused the policeman who gave her a parking ticket .
Her husband often abuses alcohol .
This hotel can accommodate 250 guests .
The scientists had to accommodate the new results with the existing theories .
The program committee acknowledged the submission of the authors of the paper .
He never acknowledges his colleagues when they run into him in the hallway .
We must acknowledge the kindness she showed towards us .
acknowledge the deed .
The Crown Prince was acknowledged as the true heir to the throne .
The residents of this village adhered to Catholicism .

The steering of my new car answers to the slightest touch .
answer the telephone .
The question concerning the meaning of life can not be answered .
The defendant answered to all the charges of the prosecution .
We ascended the mountain .

The path ascended to the top of the hill .
Hitler attacked Poland on September 1 , 1939 and started World War II .
